about_the_game:
About this Game

Set in the whimsical and modular toy world of Nimbleton, Tinker Tactics challenges players to defend their base from waves of malfunctioning toy robots. In this roguelike deckbuilder tower defense game, you strategically choose battles and receive empowering rewards to enhance your deck. Within each level, deploy and upgrade towers using your hand of cards, assigning engine components to maximize your damage output. Unlike traditional tower defenses, towers in Tinker Tactics rotate through assigned cards to generate unique attack patterns, emphasizing creativity and strategy. With increasing levels of challenge and meta-progression unlocking new cards and upgrades, every run offers a fresh and engaging experience as you strive to surpass damage thresholds and conquer the malfunctioning toy hordes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 / AMD Radeon HD 7750 or integrated graphics with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or integrated audio
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into the whimsical world of Tinker Tactics, a unique blend of roguelike deckbuilding and tower defense. Craft the perfect deck to build the most efficient engines for your toy towers, then fend off waves of malfunctioning toy robots.
